content: Hello!  Up for auction are 2 graded, low-numbered coins purchased directly from Frank @ Alpen Coin.These were the very first coins they produced, and came with no card and/or packaging.I believe mintage was 200, but not 100% sure..  Lot 1: 2020 Alpen Coin loaded with .0005 - Serial #009(!!) - Graded ICG MS67:Click for bigger images:Funding - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1CaHF5jAa5oBCgG5NwpdYYLd3HX2LhEccvLot 2: 2020 Alpen Coin loaded with .0005 - Serial #023(!!) - Graded ICG MS63:Click for bigger images:Funding - https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/17WhgbThRKLhx2uty3z7qyUBnaAZcidjaVStarting bid(s): 0.0 BTCMinimum bid increments: 0.0005 BTCEnd time : Sunday, October 16th 2022, 3:00PM EST (New York USA Time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes per lot before the auction end extend the auction an additional 10 minutes per lot. Shipping : USA - $5 First class / or $10 if Small Flat Rate Box Desired (SFRB)                Everywhere else - Will depend ofcPayment: Bitcoin - PM will be sent, feel free to ask for pgp sig etcEscrow with MoparMiningLLC , or your choice - winner pays fees/re-shipping etc.Thanks and Good luck!   Edit - Any questions just PM me!
